display_information.name: ACP Bridge Agent
display_information.description: AI agent powered by Claude that helps with development tasks via Socket Mode
display_information.long_description:
An AI agent that uses the Agent Client Protocol (ACP) to execute development tasks. Simply @mention the bot in a channel and describe what you need help with. The agent can read files, search code, run commands, and more.

Features:
- Real-time progress updates as the agent works
- Thread-based conversations for follow-ups
- Works behind firewalls using Socket Mode
- Context-aware responses based on your codebase
